name: Spreaker
description: Spreaker is a platform for creating and sharing audio content. Spreaker gives its users the chance to take part in a rich community of audio creators broadcasting thousands of shows, tracks, and playlists: they can listen to rising talents, or upload their own creations to share easily with blogs, sites, and social networks. Talents can use a professional mixing console (available both on web and mobile) to create their own mixes of voice, music and sound effects. And it is possible to broadcast live streams or just record sounds.

apis.name: Spreaker API
apis.description: nSpreaker platform enables you to host and listen thousands of radio shows. Spreaker provides a REST web service that enables developers to read and write data to Spreaker.
